SnapshotOraclev11g.name: v_score_allocation
SnapshotOraclev11g.subquery: SELECT school_code, batch_no, class_code, stream_code, term_code, subject_code, super_code, domain_code, academic_code, category_code, part_name, ranking_type, score_type, optional_type, main_max_mark AS max_main, inter_max_mark AS max_internal, main_min_mark min_main, inter_min_mark AS min_internal FROM ( SELECT sterm.school_code AS school_code, sterm.batch_no# AS batch_no, sterm.class_code AS class_code, sterm.stream_code AS stream_code, sterm.term_code AS term_code, csub.subject_code AS subject_code, ssubj.super_code AS super_code, sdom.domain_code AS domain_code, scat.academic_code AS academic_code, ssup.category_code AS category_code, ssup.part_name AS part_name, ssup.ranking_type AS ranking_type, ssup.score_type AS score_type, ssup.optional_type AS optional_type, examination_type AS examination_type, SUM(salloc.max_mark *(csub.ratio_ant / csub.ratio_con)) AS max_mark, SUM(salloc.min_mark *(csub.ratio_ant / csub.ratio_con)) AS min_mark FROM school_term sterm INNER JOIN school_super ssup ON ( ssup.school_code = sterm.school_code AND ssup.batch_no# = sterm.batch_no# AND ssup.class_code = sterm.class_code AND ssup.stream_code = sterm.stream_code ) INNER JOIN super_subject supsub ON ( supsub.code = ssup.super_code ) INNER JOIN subject_category scat ON ( scat.code = ssup.category_code ) INNER JOIN academic_category acat ON ( acat.code = scat.academic_code ) INNER JOIN school_subject ssubj ON ( ssubj.school_code = sterm.school_code AND ssubj.batch_no# = sterm.batch_no# AND ssubj.class_code = sterm.class_code AND ssubj.stream_code = sterm.stream_code AND ssup.super_code = ssubj.super_code ) INNER JOIN subject_domain sdom ON ( sdom.school_code = sterm.school_code AND sdom.class_code = sterm.class_code AND sdom.stream_code = sterm.stream_code AND sdom.subject_code = ssubj.subject_code ) INNER JOIN class_subject csub ON ( csub.school_code = sterm.school_code AND csub.batch_no# = sterm.batch_no# AND csub.class_code = sterm.class_code AND csub.stream_code = sterm.stream_code AND csub.term_code = sterm.term_code AND csub.subject_code = ssubj.subject_code ) INNER JOIN score_allocation salloc ON ( salloc.school_code = csub.school_code AND salloc.batch_no# = csub.batch_no# AND salloc.class_code = csub.class_code AND salloc.stream_code = csub.stream_code AND salloc.term_code = csub.term_code AND salloc.super_code = ssubj.super_code ) WHERE sterm.status_name = 'ACTIVE' AND ssubj.status_name = 'ACTIVE' AND csub.status_name = 'ACTIVE' AND salloc.status_name = 'ACTIVE' GROUP BY sterm.school_code, sterm.batch_no#, sterm.class_code, sterm.stream_code, sterm.term_code, ssup.part_name, ssup.ranking_type, scat.academic_code, ssup.category_code, sdom.domain_code, scat.pseudo_name, ssubj.super_code, csub.subject_code, ssup.score_type, ssup.optional_type, salloc.examination_type ) PIVOT ( SUM(min_mark) AS min_mark, SUM(max_mark) AS max_mark FOR examination_type IN ( 'EXTERNAL' AS main, 'INTERNAL' AS inter ) ) wd ORDER BY school_code, batch_no, class_code, stream_code, term_code, part_name, ( CASE WHEN ranking_type = 'YES' THEN 1 WHEN ranking_type = 'NO' THEN 2 END ) ASC, ( SELECT serial_no FROM school_super WHERE school_code = wd.school_code AND batch_no# = wd.batch_no AND class_code = wd.class_code AND stream_code = wd.stream_code AND super_code = wd.super_code ) ASC, ( SELECT serial_no FROM class_subject WHERE school_code = wd.school_code AND batch_no# = wd.batch_no AND class_code = wd.class_code AND stream_code = wd.stream_code AND term_code = wd.term_code AND subject_code = wd.subject_code ) ASC
